banner_ai_comment_not_enabled: AI Comment Selection is not enabled. You can enable it via Explore > Features > AI Comment Selection
switch_tip: After enabling, users can bulk send articles to official account followers in Article Management, and AI Comment Selection will automatically delete, reply to, and feature comments.
empty_bind_mp_tip: Please go to System Settings > Official Account Management to bind an account
alert_line_1: 1. This feature is only available for verified official accounts and supports syncing unpublished drafts from the WeChat backend.
alert_line_2: 2. Bulk-sent content will not appear in Article Management. Please note the difference between bulk send and published articles.
modal_ai_comment_not_enabled: AI Comment Selection is not enabled
modal_ai_comment_not_enabled_tip: , you can enable it via Explore > Features > AI Comment Selection
checkbox_dont_remind_three_days: Do not remind again within 3 days
modal_confirm_disable_content: After closing, this feature will be disabled by default and can no longer be used. Are you sure you want to close it?
